subject: Football
Decisions and Verdicts
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: A jury in Allison, Iowa, convicted Mark Becker of murder on Tuesday in the shooting last June of Ed Thomas, his former football coach at Aplington-Parkersburg High School.
snippet: A jury in Allison, Iowa, convicted Mark Becker of murder on Tuesday in the shooting last June of Ed Thomas, his former football coach at Aplington-Parkersburg High School.
